attributes.action: Allow UK citizens to participate  referendums regarding Independence,
attributes.additional_details: If for instance Wales had an Independence Referendum only open to Welsh voters, and they voted to leave the United Kingdom, the result would also affect citizens in the other UK countries. It would have an affect on trade, travel, leisure that makes a difference to the whole of the United Kingdom/
attributes.background: Allow all voters in the United Kingdom to participate in any Independence Referendum regarding Scotland, England, Wales or Northern Ireland.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The decision to leave the Union would be a matter for the people of England, Scotland, Wales or Northern Ireland based on their consent.
